UniprotID	H3BP28
Accession	H3BP28
EntryName	H3BP28_HUMAN
ProteinName	5-demethoxyubiquinone hydroxylase, mitochondrial (DMQ hydroxylase) (EC 1.14.99.60) (Timing protein clk-1 homolog) (Ubiquinone biosynthesis monooxygenase COQ7)
GeneName	COQ7
Length	194
Function	Catalyzes the hydroxylation of 2-polyprenyl-3-methyl-6-methoxy-1,4-benzoquinol (DMQH2) during ubiquinone biosynthesis. Has also a structural role in the COQ enzyme complex, stabilizing other COQ polypeptides. Involved in lifespan determination in a ubiquinone-independent manner.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion inner membrane
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar
